decision_conditions: Condition : 1 - The development hereby permitted shall be commenced before the expiration of 3 years from the date of planning permission 16/P2330 (outline (access) dated 6 September 2016) or 2 years from the approval of this reserved matters application (appearance, landscaping, layout and scale), whichever is the later.

Condition : 2 - The reserved matters (appearance, landscaping, layout and scale) hereby permitted shall be carried out in accordance with the following approved plans: [3642-P300, P303 Rev C, P304 Rev C, P306 Rev A, P307 Rev A, P309 and P310]

Condition : 3 - Access to the flat roof of the development hereby permitted shall be for maintenance or emergency purposes only, and the flat roof shall not be used as a roof garden, terrace, patio or similar amenity area.

Condition : 4 - Before the development hereby permitted is first occupied, the upper level windows in the side elevations shall be glazed with obscured glass and shall be maintained as such thereafter.

Condition : 5 - Notwithstanding the provisions of the Town and Country Planning (General Permitted Development) Order 1995 (or any order revoking and re-enacting that Order with or without modification), no window, dormer, rooflight or door other than those expressly authorised by this permission shall be constructed in the upper levels of the side elevations without planning permission first obtained from the Local Planning Authority.

Condition : 6 - The vehicle parking area shown on the approved plans shall be provided before the commencement of the buildings or use hereby permitted and shall be retained for parking purposes for occupiers and users of the development and for no other purpose.

Condition : 7 - Informative - You are advised that the remaining conditions and legal agreement (permit free development) attached to the substantive LBM Outline Planning Permission Ref.16/P2330 continue to apply.

Condition : 8 - Informative - You are advised that further details of the following Pre-commencement and pre-occupation conditions attached to the substantive LBM Outline Planning Permission Ref.16/P2330 are required to be discharged before the relevant trigger points - 3 (materials), 4 (surface treatment), 5 (boundary treatment), 7 (refuse storage), 10 (landscaping), 12 (arboricultural method statement), 14 (code for sustainable homes) & 15 (cycle storage)
description: APPLICATION FOR APPROVAL OF RESERVED MATTERS (APPEARANCE, LANDSCAPING, LAYOUT AND SCALE) ATTACHED TO LBM PLANNING APPLICATION 16/P2330 RELATING TO THE OUTLINE APPLICATION (ACCESS ONLY) FOR ERECTION OF TWO X DWELLINGS.
